chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cvfsi: candidates_vote_for_selves_interface

Goal:
forall (h : name) (h' : Net.name) (s : raft_data) (ps ps' : list packet) (p : packet) (d : raft_data) (r : msg) (tae : term) (li : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (lc : logIndex) (t : term) (v : bool), handleAppendEntries h s tae li pli plt es lc = (d, r) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps -> In p' ps' \/ p' = {| pSrc := h; pDst := h'; pBody := r |}) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> In p ps -> In p ps'

Premises:
term = nat : Set
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Module Net := Struct Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Definition data : BaseParams -> Type. Definition input : BaseParams -> Type. Definition output : BaseParams -> Type. Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Definition init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> data. Definition handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data. Record SingleParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_SingleParams { init
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
handleAppendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (state : raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => if t <? currentTerm state then (state, AppendEntriesReply (currentTerm state) entries false) else if prevLogIndex =? 0 then if haveNewEntries state entries then (RaftState.set_raft_data_leaderId term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_
pDst = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, pDst, _) := p in pDst : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.name Arguments pDst {P params}
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
pSrc = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (pSrc, _, _) := p in pSrc : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.name Arguments pSrc {P params}

RIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) ->...-> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}

RRIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = (d, l) -> update_elections_data_net (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = gd -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}

RRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> update_elections_data_input h inp (nwState net h) = gd -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d) h') ->...-> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
